Package thothbot.parallax.plugin.postprocessing.client.shaders

Interface Summary
DofMipmapShader.Resources  
FilmShader.Resources  
RriangleBlurShader.Resources  
 

Class Summary
BleachbypassShader Bleach bypass shader
BlendShader Blend two textures Based on three.js code
BokehShader Depth-of-field shader with bokeh Based on three.js code
Ported from GLSL shader by Martins Upitis artmartinsh.blogspot.com
ColorCorrectionShader Color correction Based on three.js code.
ColorifyShader Colorify shader Based on three.js code
ConvolutionShader Convolution shader Based on three.js code Ported from o3d sample to WebGL / GLSL o3d.googlecode.com
DofMipmapShader Depth-of-field shader using mipmaps requires power-of-2 sized render target with enabled mipmaps Based on three.js code
From Matt Handley \@applmak
DotscreenShader Dot screen shader Based on three.js code
Based on glfx.js sepia shader github.com/evanw/glfx.js
FilmShader Film grain & scanlines shader Based on three.js code
Ported from HLSL to WebGL / GLSL truevision3d.com Screen Space Static Postprocessor Produces an analogue noise overlay similar to a film grain / TV static Original implementation and noise algorithm Pat 'Hawthorne' Shearon
Optimized scanlines + noise version with intensity scaling Georg 'Leviathan' Steinrohder
FocusShader Focus shader Based on three.js code
Based on PaintEffect postprocess from ro.me code.google.com/p/3-dreams-of-black
FxaaShader NVIDIA FXAA by Timothy Lottes
HorizontalBlurShader Two pass Gaussian blur filter (horizontal and vertical blur shaders) described in gamerendering.com and used in www.cake23.de.
HorizontalTiltShiftShader Simple fake tilt-shift effect, modulating two pass Gaussian blur (see above) by vertical position Based on three.js code 9 samples per pass
standard deviation 2.7
"h" and "v" parameters should be set to "1 / width" and "1 / height"
"r" parameter control where "focused" horizontal line lies
LuminosityShader Luminosity
NormalMapShader Normal map shader Based on three.js code compute normals from heightmap
RriangleBlurShader Triangle blur shader Based on three.js code
Based on glfx.js triangle blur shader github.com/evanw/glfx.js A basic blur filter, which convolves the image with a pyramid filter.
ScreenShader Full-screen textured quad shader Based on three.js code
SepiaShader Sepia tone shader Based on thrre.js code
Based on glfx.js sepia shader github.com/evanw/glfx.js
SsaoShader Screen-space ambient occlusion shader Based on three.js code
Ported from SSAO GLSL shader v1.2 assembled by Martins Upitis (martinsh) (devlog-martinsh.blogspot.com).
UnpackDepthRGBAShader Unpack RGBA depth shader - show RGBA encoded depth as monochrome color Based on three.js code
VerticalBlurShader Vertical Blur shader Based on three.js code
VerticalTiltShiftShader Vertical Tilt Shift shader.
VignetteShader Vignette shader Based on three.js code
based on PaintEffect postprocess from ro.me code.google.com/p/3-dreams-of-black
